oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EXPERIMENTAL AND NUMERICAL STUDY ON SOLITARY WAVE BREAKING
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nishimura, Hitoshi
Takewaka, Satoshi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave breaking
numerical study
experimental study
solitary wave
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interior flow fields under drastically transforming solitary waves were visualized and recorded using a high-speed video system. Flow velocities were estimated by tracing fluid particles through spatial correlation analysis of video images. A Lagrangian equation system was successfully employed to numerically simulate twodimensional wave transformations in a vertical plane.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
